amendment.description: To ensure that products derived from tar sands are treated as crude oil for purposes of the Federal excise tax on petroleum.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 25 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 42. Record Vote Number: 24.
Amendment SA 25 proposed by Senator Markey to Amendment SA 2.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 25 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 42. Record Vote Number: 24.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 25 proposed by Senator Markey to Amendment SA 2.
